name: LetterX
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter x.
des:
From Brainsprays, the team that helped a three year old go from phonics to reading at a second grade level, comes "Letter X. " 

Letter X. assesses and the concept of phonics and allows early English readers to practice identifying words that start with "X." to improve phonic fluency.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
